policy_recommendations: Establish clear policy guidelines to resolve contradictions in facility level requirements
Conduct comprehensive benefit package review to address coverage gaps
Strengthen primary care services (Level 1-3) to improve access in rural areas
Expand specialist services coverage to address referral bottlenecks
Integrate mental health services across all care levels
Enhance maternal and child health benefit coverage
Develop clear quality standards for contracted providers

kenya_context_table.key_insight: SHIF benefit package must align with 6-tier health system
kenya_context_table.implication: Facility level requirements need clear mapping

kenya_context_table.key_insight: High burden of communicable and non-communicable diseases

kenya_context_table.implication: Need for flexible facility requirements and affordable tariffs

kenya_context_table.key_insight: SHIF designed to address NHIF limitations
kenya_context_table.implication: Benefit package should reflect lessons learned

recommendations_table.recommendation: Establish clear policy guidelines to resolve contradictions in facility level requirements
Conduct comprehensive benefit package review to address coverage gaps
Strengthen primary care services (Level 1-3) to improve access in rural areas
Expand specialist services coverage to address referral bottlenecks
Integrate mental health services across all care levels
Enhance maternal and child health benefit coverage
Develop clear quality standards for contracted providers
